short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover independently owned forum websites and get notified when there's an indie alternative to corprete owned forum.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Indie Forum Buddy is an extension that allows you to find independently owned alternatives to corporate owned forums.  This extension shows a notice on the forum website and provides a notice on the search results page.

This extension does not automatically redirect but leaves a banner/notice showcasing the independent forum website.

View us on github for source code, adding a wiki, etc: https://github.com/ScrapBlox/IndieForumBuddy

Indie Forum Buddy is not owned nor affiliated with any websites it modifies to endorse an independent alternative.
